All Classes

Class
Description
Client
This class is the model for the client entity.
ClientBLL
This class is part of the business logic and verifies the validity of a client data before introducing it into the database
ClientDAO
This is the class that manages the raw actions between the application and the clients table.
ClientsPresenter
This class is a presenter that connects the Client model class to the ClientView and is used for any action that influences the management of clients.
ClientsView
This class is the view for managing the clients.
ConnectionFactory
This class connects the application to the database
EmailValidator
 
MainPresenter
This class is the main presenter.
MainView
This view is the main view.
Order
This class is the model for the order entity.
OrderBLL
This class is part of the business logic and verifies the validity of an order data before introducing it into the database
OrderDAO
This is the class that manages the raw actions between the application and the orders table.
OrdersPresenter
This class is a presenter that connects the Order model class to the OrdersView and is used for any action that influences the management of orders.
OrdersView
This class is the view for managing the orders.
Product
This class is the model for the product entity.
ProductBLL
This class is part of the business logic and verifies the validity of the product data before introducing it into the database
ProductDAO
This is the class that manages the raw actions between the application and the products table.
ProductsPresenter
This class is a presenter that connects the Product model class to the ProductsView and is used for any action that influences the management of products.
ProductsView
This class is the view for managing the products.
QuantityValidator
This class verifies the quantity provided by the user for an order
Reflective<T>
This class is implemented using reflective techniques and is a class that manages the content of both the table of clients and of products
ReflectiveDAO<T>
 
Start
This is the Main class where the programme begins It displays the main GUI where the user can choose the entity to be managed
StockValidator
This class verifies the stock and price introduced by the user for a product
Validator<T>
This interface is used to implement the email, quantity and stock validators
